Checkout gerrit.  https://review.source.android.com/#patch,sidebyside,20672,5,gerrit-server/src/main/java/com/google/gerrit/server/project/ProjectState.java
@lcarpenter It should highlight differences
@doki_pen yes, it looks pretty good actually, I can see why you want the feature
personally, I prefer the current diff system, but I can see nothing wrong with adding another option to the mix
I'd be a fan of an additional side-by-side diff option, but it's only useful (to me) in fairly specific use cases; unified diff (the default) is typically fine. +0
Hey people
+1 for side-by-side option. The ability to ignore whitespace changes would be another nice one.
